alert.note: Alert for Coahoma; DeSoto; Tate; Tunica (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued February 02 at 8:16PM CST until February 04 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT CST THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Significant icing expected. Total ice accumulations of one tenth to one half of an inch and total sleet and snow accumulations of up to one half inch. * WHERE...Portions of North Mississippi. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to midnight CST Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep extra blankets, food, water and a flashlight in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
